mapper.select: select aname, address, addressdetail, anumber, image from tbl_acc order by bno asc
select aname, address, addressdetail, anumber, image from tbl_acc where category = #{category} order by bno asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_acc (bno, category, aname, location, address, addressdetail, anumber, url, lat, aclong, image) values (seq_acc_bno.nextval, #{category}, #{aname}, #{location}, #{address}, #{addressdetail}, #{anumber}, #{url}, #{lat}, #{aclong}, #{image})
